title: AddContextListener Request
description: A request to add a context listener to a specified Channel OR to the current user channel.

channelId.title: Channel Id
channelId.description: The id of the channel to add the listener to or `null` indicating that it should listen to the current user channel (at the time of broadcast).

contextType.title: Context type
contextType.description: The type of context to listen for OR `null` indicating that it should listen to all context types.
